title: Does the google pixel EUROPEAN model include the power adapter suitable for europe plugs in the box
content:
I bought a phone from a Vendor in Greece, that told me that the model is the european one, but when i unboxed the device i found out that the chargers plug was American and not European. They gave me an adapter from their shop. So my questions are:

1) Will i still be able to use the warranty in case that something goes wrong?
2) Does the European model comes with a european plug inside the box or there is not such thing? 

Thanks a lot in advance,

Mike Rallis
